name: Color Thief Fye (Prototype)
description: Color Thief Fye is a 2D Stealth Platformer game where the player takes control of Fye a thief. As Fye your goal is to steal as much jewels as possible while staying undetected from the guards and the other security systems. Using Fye’s unique ability to change colors hide and sneak by enemies to get rich off the corrupt businesses.
